H0.text: Breathing is the process during which animals increase in size.

H1.text: Growing is the process during which animals increase in size.

H2.text: Shedding is the process during which animals increase in size.

H3.text: Repairing is the process during which animals increase in size.

A4.text: Most organisms undergo allometric changes in shape as they grow and mature

A5.text: Caterpillars keep growing and feeding in order for enough energy during the pupal stage, when necessary body parts for metamorphosis are grown.
